snippet.title: Political Arena | A Video Game About American Power | Kickstarter | Eliot Nelson Can't Wear Hats
snippet.description:
In this completely uninterrupted presentation, game creator Eliot Nelson discusses Political Arena's features and isn't interrupted. Not once. 

Join our DISCORD: https://discord.com/channels/@politicalarena
Subscribe on YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdhQ5m0-HtUU1LEEZdjdCoQ?sub_confirmation=1
Wishlist us on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670920/Political_Arena/

Have you ever wanted to change the world? Have you ever wanted to navigate the corridors of power? Have you ever wanted to take on corporate sellouts? Have you ever wanted to evade questions about your irregular tax returns? Well, here’s your chance.

We’re building POLITICAL ARENA: a video game that puts you in the center of American democracy.  This is a first-of-its-kind political sandbox where no two playthroughs are alike, complete with high stakes campaign strategizing, backroom legislative dealing, special interests, and the ever-watchful press. Developed by acclaimed political journalist and humorist Eliot Nelson and a team of veteran game designers, developers and artists, Political Arena will be available -- with your help! -- on PCs and Macs in 2022 with more platforms to follow.  

American democracy is in peril: special interests and anti-democratic forces are growing ever more sophisticated -- leveraging the courts, fake grassroots organizations, arcane legislative maneuvers, academia, the media and more to achieve their goals.

The better you know how things work when the TV cameras are off, the better you’ll be able to bring about positive change. Plus, with POLITICAL ARENA, you’ll never have to personally endure the worst parts of elected office, like all the amorality of wearing a suit to a state fair.


Visit our WEBSITE: http://www.politicalarena.com/
Follow us on TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/politicalarena
Follow us on TWITTER: https://twitter.com/PoliticArena
